stable.change_log:
BravePipe Release 0.27.6-2.3.8

IMPORTANT INFORMATION:
- BravePipe will now be found here: https://github.com/bravepipeproject
  The git repo of the app itself: https://github.com/bravepipeproject/BravePipe
  The Extractor git repo: https://github.com/bravepipeproject/BravePipeExtractor
  -> this had to be done to comply with NewPipe's trademark stuff.

Feature:
- setting 1: Replies to a comment will be shown over current fragment
- setting 2: Comments/replies/related streams/description will scroll
  below the currently playing stream.
-> both settings are not enabled by default

Misc:
- BravePipe: There are finally some ways you can donate/give a tip.
